rules_text:
[i](Spend a different color of mana on each {mana_v.png}.)[/i]
Api's Wish is all colors.
You may reveal a multicolored card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Api's Wish.
flavor_text:
[i]“Take this gift. It's here to guide your journey in the competition. One deserving of a hero.”
—Harmon, the Messenger.[/i]
notes: You may play a multicolored card you own from outside the game this turn.
